channel.title: CVE Feed for Rextheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rextheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25708|2024-08-02T11:32:11.413Z -- rextheme -- wp%20vr%20%E2%80%93%20360%20panorama%20and%20virtual%20tour%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Rextheme WP VR – 360 Panorama and Virtual Tour Builder For WordPress plugin <= 8.2.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-52144|2024-04-15T07:11:33.429Z -- rextheme -- product%20feed%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in RexTheme Product Feed Manager.This issue affects Product Feed Manager: from n/a through 7.3.15.

item.title: CVE-2023-52144|2024-07-25T15:54:49.639Z -- rextheme -- product%20feed%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in RexTheme Product Feed Manager.This issue affects Product Feed Manager: from n/a through 7.3.15.
